resources.string:
* The three buttons correspond to three different subjects, each with their own questions.
 
* After opening a subject, Read mode and Practice mode can be switched using top-right menu button.
 
* In Read mode, correct answers are shown by default.
 
* In Practice mode, questions can be attempted before the correct answer is revealed.
 
* The language of the questions can be changed in Settings accessible using top-right menu button.
* A test with 20 randomly selected questions from the 3 subjects.

* The language for questions and their choices.
 
* This setting is not applicable to remaining GUI components like buttons etc.

* This is used to set how to navigate from one question to another.
 
* Using buttons Previous and Next: Shows two buttons, one each at the two bottom corners.
 
* Using swipe: Swipe on the screen to navigate between questions.
 
* One of them must be checked, and the app forces at least one to be checked.

* This is used to set when to validate the user choice in practice mode.
 
* Use Check Button: Provides a button at the bottom which needs to be clicked after selecting a choice to show if it is correct or not.
 
* Auto validate on choice selection: As soon as the user selects a choice, it is shown to be correct or not.
